name: part_006
file: tmp_[#SakuraMiko New 3D Unveiling] Check out the super-elite Miko! [HoloLive⧸SakuraMiko] [T7AkrTQwSjs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Situation #1: Meeting Sakura Miko at a shrine where she asks if she is an idol or a comedian.
Situation #2: Miko is in an interrogation room claiming she did nothing wrong except for a 'little robbery'.
Situation #3: Backstage before Miko's concert, she shows off her idol outfit and shares her nervousness.
Sakura Miko's new 3D unveiling MC section, where she announces her new song.
Live performance of Sakura Miko's new song 'Sakurairo High Tension'.

subtitles.original: シチュエーションその1 とある神社での出会い
subtitles.english: Situation #1: Meeting at a certain shrine

subtitles.original: 芸人だよ
subtitles.english: I'm a comedian

subtitles.original: アイドルだよ
subtitles.english: I'm an idol

subtitles.original: どう思う？
subtitles.english: How do you think?

subtitles.original: アイドル？
subtitles.english: Idol?

subtitles.original: 芸人？芸人？
subtitles.english: Comedian? Comedian?

subtitles.original: アイドル？
subtitles.english: Idol?

subtitles.original: 【35P】アイドルだよ。誰がなんて言ったって、みこちは俺のアイドルだ！
subtitles.english: [35P] You're an idol. No matter what anyone says, Mikochi is my idol!

subtitles.original: あ、ありがとう。へへ。みこも自信持たないとね！
subtitles.english: Ah, thank you. Hehe. I have to have confidence too!

subtitles.original: いつも励ましてくれてありがとうね、みこぴー！
subtitles.english: Thank you for always encouraging me, Mikopi!

subtitles.original: みこぴーはいい子だね。よしよしよしよし。
subtitles.english: Mikopi is a good kid. There, there, there, there.

subtitles.original: シチュエーションその2 みこちはなーんもわるくないー
subtitles.english: Situation #2: Miko isn't bad at all~

subtitles.original: 【35P】（みこち･･･捕まってるやんけ･･･）
subtitles.english: [35P] (Mikochi... you're caught...)

subtitles.original: うわあああああん！みこは何にも悪くないで･･･！
subtitles.english: Uwaaaa-n! I didn't do anything wrong...!

subtitles.original: ちょっと強盗しただけで何にも悪いことしてないで！
subtitles.english: I just did a little robbery, I didn't do anything bad!

subtitles.original: 【35P】自業自得、なんだよなぁ･･･
subtitles.english: [35P] You reap what you sow, huh...

subtitles.original: もうすぐライブなのにこんなところにいたらステージに立てないよぉ･･･
subtitles.english: Even though the live is soon, if I'm in a place like this I can't stand on stage...

subtitles.original: みこぴー、みこを釈放してほしいな･･･。だめ？
subtitles.english: Mikopi, I want you to release me... No?

subtitles.original: うーん、可愛いから釈放♡
subtitles.english: Well, since you're cute, release♡

subtitles.original: 逮捕です。
subtitles.english: You're under arrest.

subtitles.original: 可愛いは正義だから。ね、いいよねみこ。
subtitles.english: Cuteness is justice. Right, it's okay, right Miko?

subtitles.original: どう？どう？何にも悪くないだろう？
subtitles.english: How? How? I didn't do anything wrong, right?

subtitles.original: 可愛いは正義だから。
subtitles.english: Because cuteness is justice.

subtitles.original: 【35P】うーん、可愛いから釈放！♡
subtitles.english: [35P] Well, since you're cute, release!♡

subtitles.original: わああああ！ありがとう！みこ、がんばるね！
subtitles.english: Waaaaa! Thank you! I'll do my best!

subtitles.original: みこぴーは優しいなぁ〜。このこの〜。
subtitles.english: Mikopi is so kind~. You rascal~.

subtitles.original: シチュエーションその3 めざせ！Elite Idol！さくらみこ
subtitles.english: Situation #3: Aiming to be an elite idol! Sakura Miko

subtitles.original: みこぴー、どお？似合ってる？みこのアイドル衣装だよ〜！
subtitles.english: Mikopi, how is it? Does it suit me? It's my idol outfit!

subtitles.original: 【35P】すごく似合ってる！かわいい！さすがぽんこつエリートだな！
subtitles.english: [35P] It suits you perfectly! So cute! As expected of the ponkotsu elite!

subtitles.original: ぽんこつは余計なんですけど！
subtitles.english: Ponkotsu is extra!

subtitles.original: でも･･･緊張しすぎて逃げたい･･･。うぅ･･･おなかが･･･
subtitles.english: But... I'm so nervous I want to run away... Uuu... my stomach...

subtitles.original: みこダンスも上手くないし、みこよりもっとかわいいみんながいるのに･･･
subtitles.english: I'm not good at dancing, and there are everyone else who are cuter than me...

subtitles.original: 合いの手とかしてくれるのかな。大丈夫かな？
subtitles.english: I wonder if they'll give me call-and-response. Is it going to be okay?

subtitles.original: 弱音吐くんじゃねぇ！
subtitles.english: Don't spit out weakness!

subtitles.original: 思いっきり楽しんでおいで！
subtitles.english: Go enjoy yourself with all your might!

subtitles.original: プロデューサー力試されてんぜ！どうどう？
subtitles.english: My producer skills are being tested! How, how?

subtitles.original: かわいい？ん？
subtitles.english: Is it cute? Hm?

subtitles.original: 【35P】大丈夫、みんな待ってるよ！思いっきり楽しんでおいで
subtitles.english: [35P] It's okay, everyone is waiting! Go enjoy yourself with all your might

subtitles.original: いつも優しく背中押してくれてありがとうね。
subtitles.english: Thank you for always kindly pushing me forward.

subtitles.original: ぽんこつになったり、やんちゃやっちゃったりするのに、それでもアイドルだって信じてくれてありがとう。
subtitles.english: Even though I become ponkotsu or do mischievous things, thank you for believing that I'm an idol.

subtitles.original: みこ、がんばるから、これからもずっとみこぴーでいてね！
subtitles.english: I'll do my best, so please stay as a Mikopi from now on too!

subtitles.original: それじゃ〜、ハイテンションでアイドルしてくるね〜！
subtitles.english: Well then~, I'm going to be an idol with high tension!

subtitles.original: はーい！みんなー！エリートみこ、
subtitles.english: Hi! Everyone! Elite Miko,

subtitles.original: アイドルのさくらみこでーしゅ！いぇーい！
subtitles.english: the idol Sakura Miko is here! Yay!

subtitles.original: ということで、今日はみこの新３Ｄお披露目と、あとはライブに来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: So, thank you for coming to my new 3D unveiling and the live today!

subtitles.original: ということで、今日はなんとなんと、みんなに新曲がありまーす！いぇーい！
subtitles.english: So, today, believe it or not, I have a new song for everyone! Yay!

subtitles.original: 初お披露目だよ！
subtitles.english: It's the first unveiling!

subtitles.original: ということで、びっくりしてるよねみんなね。びっくりした？はい！
subtitles.english: So, everyone is surprised, right? Were you surprised? Yes!

subtitles.original: ということで、それでは早速歌いたいと思います。聴いてください。
subtitles.english: So, I'd like to sing right away. Please listen.

subtitles.original: さくら色ハイテンション！
subtitles.english: Sakurairo High Tension!

subtitles.original: ねぇこっち見てほら瞳合わせてよそっと息を止めて
subtitles.english: Hey look over here, look, let's meet our eyes, hold your breath softly

subtitles.original: 重ね合わせたさくら色の想い受け止めてよねぇ
subtitles.english: Accept these cherry-blossom colored feelings that we've layered together
